Title: Relates to the remediation and prevention of indoor mold
Summary: Relates to the remediation and prevention of indoor mold; requires notification to prospective lessees.
LawCode: Add §16-a, Pub Hous L; add Art 48-A §4809, Pub Health L; amd §462, add §235-j, RP L; add §27-2009.3, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, the public health law, and the real property law, in relation to the remediation and prevention of indoor mold; and to amend the real property law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring notice of indoor mold history to prospective lessees of apartments
